content: We had an explicit instance of FunLike for Equiv. There was a todo note indicating this was probably unnecessary (pending benchmarking, which I think means essentially checking it doesn't create compile time issues). I have prepared #26220, which removes that instance, and performs a couple of other tidying changes to EquivLike, adding a coe_apply lemma which smooths over the loss in the few places there were proof issues.
Any interest/progress in this? It seems to work fine.
